name: connectedly

joining together different things in a way that makes sense: It was so loud in the bar that I found it hard to think connectedly. She spoke very amusingly, but not entirely connectedly, about her experiences as a teenager.
in a way that is related to what has just been stated: He made a few mistakes and, connectedly, things started to go wrong for him. She loves classical music and, connectedly, has little time for modern music.
